venue.name: Pleasant St. Tea Co. & Coffee Bar

item.description:
It's wintertime, despite what the weather will have you think, and time to reconnect with old gaming friends. Bring a game. Bring a friend. All levels and styles of play welcome.

Parking is free throughout the City since it is a Sunday. Come by train and enjoy a nice walk (about 1/2 a mile). Please make a small purchase to offset the use of the space to the fine folks at Pleasant St. Tea Company. Their teas are excellent!

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Tea time games
